articles.title: Mystery gemstones that sparked South Africa diamond rush just quartz crystals - ABC News
articles.description: Thousands of fortune seekers who rushed to a hillside in South Africa digging for diamonds learn the mystery gemstones are just quartz crystals with relatively low, if any, value.
articles.content:
Gemstones that sparked a diamond rush in eastern South Africa last week have turned out to be just quartz, according to preliminary findings.
